question: For resistance to Selumetinib in Lung Cancer, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Selumetinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Selumetinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Selumetinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selumetinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Fluorouracil')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Crizotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: For resistance to Docetaxel in Carcinoma Of The Head And Neck, which therapies target the resistance biomarkers?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Docetaxel')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Docetaxel'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Docetaxel')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Docetaxel')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Mirdametinib')

  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,

LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Carboplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Carboplatin'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Carboplatin')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'ovarian'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Carboplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('PI-103')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PI-103'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('PI-103')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('PI-103')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Selpercatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Vemurafenib in Clear Cell Sarcoma.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Vemurafenib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Vemurafenib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Vemurafenib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'clear' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Vemurafenib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Methotrexate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Methotrexate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Methotrexate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Methotrexate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Tandutinib in Acute Myeloid Leukemia.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Tandutinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Tandutinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Tandutinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'acute' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Tandutinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

LIMIT 100

  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (

  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Crizotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Lapatinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Lapatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Lapatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Lapatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Dasatinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Dasatinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Dasatinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Cisplatin in Adenocarcinoma Of Stomach?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Cisplatin')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Cisplatin'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Cisplatin')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'gastric' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Cisplatin')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Pembrolizumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Pembrolizumab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Pembrolizumab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Pembrolizumab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Which drugs target biomarkers of resistance to Alectinib in Lung Non-small Cell Carcinoma?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Alectinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Alectinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Alectinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Alectinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Fluorouracil in Malignant Tumor Of Distal Third Of Esophagus.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Fluorouracil')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Fluorouracil'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Fluorouracil')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'esophageal'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Fluorouracil')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In CML - Chronic Myelogenous Leukemia, what therapies target genes causing resistance to Imatinib Mesylate?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Imatinib Mesylate'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'chronic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia'
  )

WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Imatinib Mesylate')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('U0126')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('U0126'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('U0126')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('U0126')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Erlotinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Erlotinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Erlotinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'adenocarcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Erlotinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Radiation Therapy')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Radiation Therapy'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Radiation Therapy')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'head' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'and' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neck' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )

WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol

MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Radiation Therapy')

  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,

cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'vulva' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'squamous' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Durvalumab in Non-small Cell Lung Cancer.
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Durvalumab')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Durvalumab'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Durvalumab')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Durvalumab')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Palbociclib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Palbociclib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Palbociclib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'sarcoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Palbociclib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Everolimus')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Everolimus'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Everolimus')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'bladder' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Everolimus')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: In Non-small Cell Lung Cancer, what therapies target genes causing resistance to Ceritinib?
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Ceritinib')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Ceritinib'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Ceritinib')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'lung' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'non-small' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cell' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Ceritinib')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'cancer'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('MDM2 Inhibitor AMGMDS3')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('AZ12908010')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('AZ12908010'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('AZ12908010')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'myeloid' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'neoplasm'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('AZ12908010')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100

question: Find therapies that target resistance genes for Not Applicable in q22.1).
cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('Not Applicable')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t1.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Not Applicable'))
  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('Not Applicable')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'b-lymphoblastic' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'leukemia/lymphoma' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'with' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'etv6-runx1'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('Not Applicable')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls
LIMIT 100
